General.Name: Dalian Insulator Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Dalian Insulator Group Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of porcelain insulators in China and internationally. It offers insulators for transmission lines; station post insulators; and post insulators. Dalian Insulator Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1915 and is based in Dalian, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 88, Liaohe East Road, Dalian, China, 116600

1.Name: Mr. Jun  Li
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
